      • AI

        public static void AI​(char[][] grid1,
                      int compScore,
                      int playerScore)
        Determines the gameplay in the versus computer mode. Shots are randomly fired by the program, which are then determined if their a hit or a miss. The method compares the score of both the user and the program to determine the winner.
        Parameters:
        grid -
